name: Odd One Out 1 Online Quiz | Odd One Out | 10 Questions

questions.text: In terms of sleep schedules, which animal does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Mole.

	All the rest are nocturnal.

questions.text: Which language does not belong in terms of writing systems?
questions.explanation:
Mandarin.

	The other three are based on alphabetic writing systems.

questions.text: One of the following is not derived from grapes. Pick the one.
questions.explanation:
Gin.

	Gin is derived from white grain spirit and flavoured with juniper berries.

questions.text: Which of the following musical instruments does not belong as it is NOT a brass instrument?
questions.explanation:
Flute.

	French horns, trumpets, and tubas belong to the brass family.

questions.text: Which of the following places does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Chicago.

	The other three are airports.

questions.text: Which of the following is an amphibian?
Which is not a state capital?
questions.explanation:
Las Vegas, Nevada.

	Carson city is the capital of Nevada.

questions.text: Which is not a blended whiskey?
questions.explanation:
Old Crow.

	Old Crow is a bourbon.

questions.text: Which is not a New England state?

questions.explanation:
New York, New York.

	New York, New York was a hit for Frank Sinatra among others. The other three were hits for Elvis.
